cause.description:
THERE IS STILL TIME...
1. Go to the theater and see it; any night,
2. If your theater isn't playing it any more, rent it,
3. At 12:00 a.m. (Central Martian Time), :] run at the screen/t.v. jump into the screen or t.v. with any type of head accesorie...on your head... yelling the following aloud (icky, icky, icky, pickong, zoom, ping); trust me the quicker the spartans win, the
cause.name: Reinforce the 300!
